name: Behemoth (Nel Daues)
description:
Submission to the Secret Santa Jam 2021. For Boataro-Kujo.

Prompt: Big Bad Bug

*Just a note, this is just a text version of the game, I'm not quite finished with the visuals and audio and will be adding them later, hopefully before the new year. It should be able to stand on its own the way it is right now so feel free to play it if you really want. Or feel free to wait until it's all there.

Made with Twine 2
